Class ActorRef<T>

java.lang.Object
com.scivicslab.pojoactor.ActorRef<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the actor's underlying object
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class ActorRef<T> extends Object implements AutoCloseable
A reference to an actor that provides messaging capabilities and lifecycle management. This class implements the actor model pattern, allowing asynchronous message passing between actors using tell() and ask() methods.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
devteam@scivics-lab.com

      private Logger logger
      A logger for the ActorRef. In order to be able to change the name of the logger later, it is not made static here.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActorRef

      public ActorRef(String actorName, T object)
      Constructs an ActorRef with the specified name and object.
      Parameters:
      actorName - the unique name for this actor
      object - the object that will handle messages for this actor

    • ActorRef

      public ActorRef(String actorName, T object, ActorSystem actorSystem)
      Constructs an ActorRef with the specified name, object, and actor system.
      Parameters:
      actorName - the unique name for this actor
      object - the object that will handle messages for this actor
      actorSystem - the actor system this actor belongs to

      Returns:
      a reference to the created child actor

      Returns:
      a set containing the names of child actors

    • getParentName

      public String getParentName()
      Returns the name of this actor's parent, if any.
      Returns:
      the parent actor's name, or null if this actor has no parent

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Checks if this actor is still alive and able to process messages.
      Returns:
      true if the actor is alive, false otherwise

      Returns:

    • tell

      public CompletableFuture<Void> tell(Consumer<T> action)
      Sends a message to the actor defined by this reference. The specified action is executed on the actor's object asynchronously in actor's thread context. This method does not wait for completion of the action, it returns immediately.
      Parameters:
      action - action to be executed on actor's object.

    • ask

      public <R> CompletableFuture<R> ask(Function<T,R> action)
      Sends a message to actor and returns a CompletableFuture to be completed with the response value. Performs the specified call on the actor's object asynchronously. The call is executed in this actor's thread context, the future is then completed with the result value in the caller's actor thread context. If the method is called not from actor's context, exception is thrown. This method returns a CompletableFuture, which is completed with a result once the actor's call completes. If an exception occurs during actor's call, the exception is then passed to the CompletableFuture and the actor's exception handler is not triggered. Both successful and failed completions occur in the caller's actor thread context.
      Type Parameters:
      R - actor call response class
      Parameters:
      action - action to be executed on actor's object, return value will be the response
      Returns:
      CompletableFuture to be completed with the actor's call result

    • tell

      public CompletableFuture<Void> tell(Consumer<T> action, ExecutorService ws)
      Sends a message to this actor using a specific executor service. The action is executed asynchronously on the provided executor service, and the result is processed in this actor's thread context.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to execute on this actor's object
      ws - the executor service to use for executing the action
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture that completes when the action is processed

    • ask

      public <R> CompletableFuture<R> ask(Function<T,R> action, ExecutorService ws)
      Sends a message to this actor and returns a response using a specific executor service. The action is executed asynchronously on the provided executor service, and the result is processed in this actor's thread context.
      Type Parameters:
      R - the type of the response
      Parameters:
      action - the function to execute on this actor's object
      ws - the executor service to use for executing the action
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture containing the response from the action

    • close

      public void close()
      Destroys the actor and cleans up its resources. Pending messages will be cancelled and the actor will be removed from its system. This method implements the AutoCloseable interface for resource management.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
